rules.ruleString: Must be enrolled in course type {04, 05, 06, 06G, 06PG, 06PGZA, 07, 07G, 07PG, 11, 42, 50PG, 56, 76, 78}

description: The paediatric nurse requires a diverse knowledge and skill base to assess and manage patients in a variety of settings. The unit enables the student to develop proficiency in the holistic management of sick children, beyond the beginning specialist level, and prepares students for leadership roles in their practice area.
faculty: Faculty of Medicine, Nursing and Health Sciences
